name: Escape The Camp
description:
Escape The Camp is  a 2D survival Horror Escape Game. Made for SpookyJam 2D 2020 in 2 days. your in a haunted campground were all the campers have disappeared and strange creatures wonder. find the key and escape. 

game has a timer and key has 10 different spawns . so replay over and over and try to beat you escape time....or die trying ! POST BEST TIME IN COMMENTS!

Check Out My twitter and Youtube in game!.

Controls:

L.Shift= Sprint

W,A,S,D = Move

Mouse= Rotate Player

F = Flash Light
